snippet: For two young children who had been to maybe five major league games in their whole lives, watching Johan Santana’s no-hitter was a sight to behold.
abstract: John Branch Cheering Section column recounts being in attendance with his family for New York Mets pitcher Johan Santana's no-hitter against the St Louis Cardinals.
lead_paragraph: For two young children who had been to maybe five major league games in their whole lives, watching Johan Santana’s no-hitter was a sight to behold.

headline.main: When History Sneaks Up on You
headline.print_headline: When Mets History Sneaks Up on You
